parameters.name: contribId
parameters.description: defines the contribute id for which user want access data.

parameters.name: dataAccesskey
parameters.description: defines what entity name for which user want to access data.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: defines limit to access fix number of records.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: defines comma seperated fields to get result in order.

parameters.name: dataSource
parameters.description: defines data source user want to access data.

parameters.name: offSet
parameters.description: defines number of records skip after ordering.

parameters.name: envType
parameters.description: defines what environment's data user want to access.

QueryFilter.description: This filter applies to complex queries with where clause.

FieldName.description: defines field of table or query.

AdvanceFilter.description: This filter applies to simple queries.

Field.description: defines field of table or query.

Filter.description: Defines and pass filter in body.

QueryFilters.description: Defines filter applies to complex queries with where clause

AdditionalFilters.description: This filter applies to simple queries.
